text: Parliamentary elections in Turkmenistan that are scheduled for December 15 of this year will be held on a two - party basis, for the first time in the country ’ s history, according to the Central Elections Commission of Turkmenistan.
title: 27 / 09 / 2013 - Turkmenistan to hold first - ever parliamentary elections on a two - party basis.
